items.title: [Coding-relatedEnglish]
items.content_html:
记点常见单词
module 'mɑːdʒuːl 模块; 组件;
deprecated ˈdeprəkeɪtɪd 弃用,不赞成
fragment ˈfræɡmənt 碎片; 片段;
register ˈredʒɪstər 注册
archive ˈɑːrkaɪv 档案 把…归档
concatenate kɑnˈkæt(ə)ˌneɪt 连接
maven ˈmeɪvn 专家; 内行;
alias ˈeɪliəs 别名
manual ˈmænjuəl 手册
mutable ˈmjuːtəb 可变的
refactor ri’fæktə 重构
expires ɪkˈspaɪərz 失效; 到期;
syntax ˈsɪntæks 句法
segment ˈseɡmənt 部分; 份; 片; 段;
PermaLink permanent link
hints hɪnts 暗示; 提示;
pagination ˌpædʒɪˈneɪʃn 标页码; 页码;
retrieve rɪˈtriːv 恢复; 检索; 取回;
repository rɪˈpɑːzətɔːri 仓库;
asterisks æstərɪsks 星号
assemble əˈsembəl 凑集
emulate /ˈemyəˌlāt/ 仿真
workbench 工作台
hierarchy ˈhaɪərɑːrki 层次
delimiter 分隔符; 定界符
manipulate / məˈnɪpjuleɪt 操纵；(暗中)控制；影响
integration ˌɪntɪˈɡreɪʃn 综合, 集成
explicit / ɪkˈsplɪsɪt 明确的；详述的；
manifest / ˈmænɪfest 明显的;显而易见的
nonaggregated 未聚集的
audit / ˈɔːdɪt 审计
truncate / ˈtrʌŋkeɪt vt.截断；截短 adj.截短的；被删节的
retrieve / rɪˈtriːv vt.检索；取回；找回 n. 恢复
retention / rɪˈtenʃn 保持；维持；保留；
redundant / rɪˈdʌndənt 冗余的；多余的
unary / ˈjuːnəri 一元的
retain / rɪˈteɪn 保持；保留；持有；
batch bætʃ 一批

RTFM && STFW

缩写 Read the fxxx manual 和 Search the fxxx web
论坛常见, 回答给不会提问的人

提问的智慧

foo-bar

编程中用来代替一些语句,变量名
foo fu的变体, fuck up
bar beyond all recognition
暗指调侃一团糟的代码
Fucked Up Beyond All Recognition

items.title: [CommonAbbreviation]
items.content_html:
一些常见简写/缩写

A

addr = address
app = application
arg = argument
asm = assemble
asyn = asynchronization
auth = authorization / authentication
avg = average

B

buf = buffer

C

calc = calculate
cert = certificate
cmd = command
cmp = compare
col = column
coord = coordinates
cur = current

D

db = database
dec = decrease
del = delete
dest / dst = destination
dev = device
dict = dictionary
diff = different
dir = directory
dist = distribution
disp = display
dlg = dialog
doc = document
drv = driver

E

env = environment
err = error
esc = escape
ext = extension
exec = execute

F

frm = frame
func / fn = function

G

grp = group

H

horz = horizontal

I

idx = index
img = image
inc = increase
info = information
init = initial/initialize/initialization
ins = insert
inst = instance
intr = interrupt
i18n = internationalization

L

lang = language
len = length
lib = library
lst = list
lhs = left hand side

M

max = maximum
mem = memory
mid = middle
msg = message
mul = multiply

N

num = number

O

obj = object
ofs = offset
org = origin

P

param = parameter
pic = picture
pkg = package
pos = position
prev = previous
prg = program
proc = process / procedure
prop = properties
psw = password
ptr = pointer
pub = public

R

ref = reference
reg = register
req = request
resp = response
res = result
ret = return
rgn = region
rsrc = resource
rhs = right hand side , 右值

S

scr = screen
sec = second
seg = segment
sel = select
src = source
std = standard
stm = stream
str = string
sub = subtract
sum = summation
svr = server
sync = synchronization
sys = system

T

tmp / temp = temporary
tran / trans = translate/transation/transparent
txt = text

U

upd = update
upg = upgrade
util = utility

V

var = variable
ver = version
vert = vertical

W

wnd = window

items.title: [WordsToMemo]
items.content_html:
学点英语

concise /kənˈsīs/ 形容词: 简洁, 简明,
soft demeanor 温柔的风度
sheer determination 坚定决心
wholesome 健康, 有益, 合乎卫生的
assault 突击, 进攻
vault 金库，保险库;
extract 摘录; 提取; 提炼;
utility n.公用事业; 实用程序; adj. 多用途的;
